originalText.text: Does not know how to do math. Claims screen protector is 10 dollars and a case is 15. I give them $30 and I get $5 dollars change. They didn't have a case for my specific model. They still jammed my phone into it. Noticing this I request a refund on the case cause it does not fit, they only give me $10 back. 30 - 5 - 10 = 15. They took $15 for my $10 screen protector. They would not give me my money back. Scam artists.

originalText.text: The Twins in Cellular would be the root of the greatness environment that I was able to shop in for wonderful products. This trumps target, bestbuy and Costco customer experience was through the roof. Instead of being rejected like target entrance feelings, I was welcomed with a vast number of great attitudes with a little walk around I was able to find the perfect item. Then Twins Cellular gave me the time to learn about their product offerings. True Thanks to this amazing store and goodbye internet purchases!

originalText.text: The African American guy there is not helpful at all.  Always he neglects people and he gives them a run around.  Avoid him.. better to avoid this store all together because the price is too high anyway---
